Kanami-san has it tough too...\""},{"lineNumber":190896,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら、志津香にとって親しい間柄に","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, to Shizuka, that woman, someone close,"},{"lineNumber":190897,"originalJapaneseLine":"あるらしきその女性は苦労が絶えないらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"seems to suffer endless hardships."},{"lineNumber":190898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーい、主君どのー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, my lord!"},{"lineNumber":190899,"originalJapaneseLine":"　主君も一緒に手裏剣投げしないでござるかー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Won't you throw shuriken together with me?\""},{"lineNumber":190900,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウズメは無邪気に笑っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Uzume was smiling innocently."},{"lineNumber":190901,"originalJapaneseLine":"町に買い物に出ると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When going out shopping in town,"},{"lineNumber":190902,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故かウズメもついてくることになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"for some reason, Uzume ended up coming along."},{"lineNumber":190903,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日のウズメ、護衛。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today's Uzume is the bodyguard."},{"lineNumber":190904,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えっへんでござる」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ehehen!\""},{"lineNumber":190905,"originalJapaneseLine":"何故かウズメは薄い胸をえへんと張った。","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, Uzume puffed out her flat chest proudly."},{"lineNumber":190906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「主君に何かあってはいかんでござるからね、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Something must not happen to my lord,"},{"lineNumber":190907,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はウズメが傍で守るでござる」","translatedEnglishLine":"so today Uzume will protect you by your side.\""},{"lineNumber":190908,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、主君は強いので護衛なんて","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, since my lord is strong,"},{"lineNumber":190909,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当はいらんでござるけどね。","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really need to be a bodyguard."},{"lineNumber":190910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一緒に遊びに行く口実でござる」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just an excuse to go out and have fun together.\""},{"lineNumber":190911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、行こう行こーうでござる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, let's go!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっ、ほっ、はーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yo, ho, ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早朝、ウズメが手裏剣術の訓練をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Early in the morning, Uzume was training in shuriken techniques.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、おはようござる、主君どの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, good morning, my lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すこん、すこん、すこーん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thud, thud, swoosh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔はあなたに向けたまま、ウズメが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With her face still turned towards you, Uzume

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木にくくりつけられた的に手裏剣を命中させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hits the target tied to the tree with her shuriken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その技術力にあなたはパチパチと拍手を送った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You applaud her skill with a round of claps.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にょほほ、照れるでござるね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nyohoho, I'm flattered, indeed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この手の技術は全て母上殿に教わったでござる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All these kinds of skills were taught to me by my mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメが褒められると母上殿が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Uzume is praised, my mother

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 褒められたようで嬉しいでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seems pleased as if she herself were praised."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば前にも言ったでござるね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that you mention it, I've said it before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメの師匠は母上殿でござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uzume's master is my mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウズメの母上殿？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uzume's mother?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもうすごい人でござるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She's truly an amazing person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その攻撃は雷のように苛烈、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her attacks are fierce like lightning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その動きは木の葉のように軽やか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her movements as light as leaves,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その心は川のように柔軟……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and her spirit as flexible as a river..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさに忍者の理想を体現される人でござる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She embodies the very ideal of a ninja.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメも母上殿にだけは頭が上がらない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume can't hold her head up high before her mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「小さい頃から、それはもう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since I was little, really,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たっくさんのことを教わったでござるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've learned so many things from her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやらよほど尊敬しているらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems she respects her very much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親のことを語るウズメは活き活きとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume looked lively as she spoke about her mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウズメはお母さん、好きよねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uzume really loves her mother, doesn't she...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、志津香姉上」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, sister Shizuka."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うい、母上殿はウズメにとって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, my mother is to Uzume

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母にして師匠にして憧れでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both a mother, a master, and an admiration."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、魔王の子って大体みんな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the children of the Demon King are usually all

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親と仲良しだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: close with their mothers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「憧れ……憧れ、ねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Admiration... admiration, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　どうかしたでござる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? Is something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーん、なんでも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm, nothing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、＜エール＞は何も知らないんだっけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, <Yell> doesn't know anything, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こそっと、あなたにだけ聞こえるような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quietly, so only you can hear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな声で志津香が囁く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka whispers in a small voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウズメのお母さんって確かに忍者だけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uzume's mother is certainly a ninja, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 能力自体は、その……中の上くらいでね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her abilities themselves are... well... above average..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「要はウズメの方が才能も能力も高いのよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In short, Uzume has greater talent and ability...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが分かってないのはウズメだけでね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Uzume is the only one who doesn't realize this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……かなみさんも大変だわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... Kanami-san has it tough too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、志津香にとって親しい間柄に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, to Shizuka, that woman, someone close,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるらしきその女性は苦労が絶えないらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seems to suffer endless hardships.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーい、主君どのー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, my lord!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主君も一緒に手裏剣投げしないでござるかー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Won't you throw shuriken together with me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメは無邪気に笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume was smiling innocently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町に買い物に出ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When going out shopping in town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かウズメもついてくることになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for some reason, Uzume ended up coming along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日のウズメ、護衛。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today's Uzume is the bodyguard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっへんでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ehehen!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かウズメは薄い胸をえへんと張った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Uzume puffed out her flat chest proudly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「主君に何かあってはいかんでござるからね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something must not happen to my lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はウズメが傍で守るでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so today Uzume will protect you by your side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、主君は強いので護衛なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, since my lord is strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当はいらんでござるけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really need to be a bodyguard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に遊びに行く口実でござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just an excuse to go out and have fun together."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、行こう行こーうでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, let's go!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

bodyguard."},{"lineNumber":190910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一緒に遊びに行く口実でござる」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just an excuse to go out and have fun together.\""},{"lineNumber":190911,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さ、行こう行こーうでござる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, let's go!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっ、ほっ、はーっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yo, ho, ha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早朝、ウズメが手裏剣術の訓練をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Early in the morning, Uzume was training in shuriken techniques.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、おはようござる、主君どの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, good morning, my lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すこん、すこん、すこーん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thud, thud, swoosh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔はあなたに向けたまま、ウズメが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With her face still turned towards you, Uzume

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木にくくりつけられた的に手裏剣を命中させる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hits the target tied to the tree with her shuriken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その技術力にあなたはパチパチと拍手を送った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You applaud her skill with a round of claps.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にょほほ、照れるでござるね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nyohoho, I'm flattered, indeed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この手の技術は全て母上殿に教わったでござる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All these kinds of skills were taught to me by my mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメが褒められると母上殿が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Uzume is praised, my mother

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 褒められたようで嬉しいでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seems pleased as if she herself were praised."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば前にも言ったでござるね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now that you mention it, I've said it before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメの師匠は母上殿でござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uzume's master is my mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウズメの母上殿？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uzume's mother?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもうすごい人でござるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She's truly an amazing person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その攻撃は雷のように苛烈、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her attacks are fierce like lightning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その動きは木の葉のように軽やか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her movements as light as leaves,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その心は川のように柔軟……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and her spirit as flexible as a river..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさに忍者の理想を体現される人でござる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She embodies the very ideal of a ninja.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメも母上殿にだけは頭が上がらない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume can't hold her head up high before her mother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「小さい頃から、それはもう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since I was little, really,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たっくさんのことを教わったでござるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've learned so many things from her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやらよほど尊敬しているらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems she respects her very much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親のことを語るウズメは活き活きとしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume looked lively as she spoke about her mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウズメはお母さん、好きよねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uzume really loves her mother, doesn't she...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、志津香姉上」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, sister Shizuka."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うい、母上殿はウズメにとって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, my mother is to Uzume

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母にして師匠にして憧れでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: both a mother, a master, and an admiration."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、魔王の子って大体みんな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the children of the Demon King are usually all

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母親と仲良しだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: close with their mothers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「憧れ……憧れ、ねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Admiration... admiration, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　どうかしたでござる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? Is something wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーん、なんでも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm, nothing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、＜エール＞は何も知らないんだっけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, <Yell> doesn't know anything, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こそっと、あなたにだけ聞こえるような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quietly, so only you can hear,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小さな声で志津香が囁く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka whispers in a small voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウズメのお母さんって確かに忍者だけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uzume's mother is certainly a ninja, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 能力自体は、その……中の上くらいでね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her abilities themselves are... well... above average..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「要はウズメの方が才能も能力も高いのよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In short, Uzume has greater talent and ability...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが分かってないのはウズメだけでね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Uzume is the only one who doesn't realize this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……かなみさんも大変だわ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... Kanami-san has it tough too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、志津香にとって親しい間柄に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, to Shizuka, that woman, someone close,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるらしきその女性は苦労が絶えないらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seems to suffer endless hardships.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーい、主君どのー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, my lord!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主君も一緒に手裏剣投げしないでござるかー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Won't you throw shuriken together with me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメは無邪気に笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume was smiling innocently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町に買い物に出ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When going out shopping in town,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かウズメもついてくることになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for some reason, Uzume ended up coming along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日のウズメ、護衛。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today's Uzume is the bodyguard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっへんでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ehehen!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故かウズメは薄い胸をえへんと張った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Uzume puffed out her flat chest proudly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「主君に何かあってはいかんでござるからね、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Something must not happen to my lord,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はウズメが傍で守るでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so today Uzume will protect you by your side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、主君は強いので護衛なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, since my lord is strong,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当はいらんでござるけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really need to be a bodyguard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に遊びに行く口実でござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's just an excuse to go out and have fun together."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、行こう行こーうでござる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, let's go!"
